text: 26.23 Ais 42.6, 49.6, Luk 24.26, 24.44-47, 1 Ko 15.20, Kol 1.18 Kɨli agɨlak, Bɨ God nop aglup ak ne apɨl, yul awl dɨl kumnɨgab agɨlak agak. Kumɨl, ne ned jɨj ak tɨkjakɨnɨgab agɨlak agak. Ak nɨm, ne God mɨlek takaw ak dɨl age, Juda binɨb okok sek, binɨb Juda mel okok sek nɨgɨnɨgabal agɨlak agak.
